options.title: Full Management
options.tab-title: Full Management Service | Tourist Services | Rentaleazy
items: Change of bed and bath linen
options.description: *Personalized service for the management of your tourist apartment, from managing reservations on multiple platforms, to the reception of guests 24 hours a day. We offer counseling, profesional cleaning and full review of your apartment to make sure everything is in working order. Everything you need to get the most out of your rental*

options.title: Check-in Service
items: Reception and welcome to the apartment
Explanation of the operation of the house
Information about activities in the city

who.title: ¿Who are we?
who.p1: Rentaleazy is a team of professionals in the hospitality industry, experts in reservation management, advert positioning on multiple platforms and customer service.
who.p2: We offer all kinds of services and complete management of your property.
who.p3: In order to get the most out of your rental, achieve a better price optimisation and increase your income.
who.p4: We focus on getting maximum profit and return on your rental property, without you having to worry about anything.

why.title: ¿Why Rentaleazy?
why.p1: We are pioneers with a long track record in the sector of tourist rentals, as well as short and long term stays.
why.p2: Our trained multilingual staff is very professional, friendly and passionate about customer service.
why.p4: Our commitment is to offer an optimal experience, leading to profitability and growth.
why.p5: With Rentaleazy you will have peace of mind that your property is in good hands and your guests are well taken care of. Increase your income without having to worry about anything.

alquiler.tab-title: Medium and long term rentals | Rentaleazy
alquiler.title: Medium and long term rentals
alquiler.text1: We take care of the complete management of short and long term rentals, as well as student flats. You'll get more income and flexibility than with a long-term rental.

text2.p1: We have two types of rental for your medium and long-term rental apartment.
items: Rent per room: Rooms are rented individually.
Rent per apartment: The entire apartment is rented.
text2.p2: We manage the accommodation of young professionals, university students, masters and PhD as well as working people.
text2.p3: Selecting those profiles that fit your desires: Men, women, Spanish or international master students, young professionals etc.
text2.p4: You'll get more income and flexibility than with a long-term rental.
text2.p5: Save time and free yourself from worries knowing that your apartment is in the best conditions and generating the highest income.

text3.p1: We offer you the most complete service, to ensure the success in renting your apartment.

items.title: Booking and advertisement management
items.text: Maximum occupancy guaranteed, we have great positioning on the main advert platforms.

items.title: Interior Design
items.text: We advise you on interior decoration, to have your apartment with the latest decoration trends, and get the most profit out of your rental

items.title: Furnishing
items.text: We furnish your apartment according to the profile of tenants to whom you want to lease the house, adapting to your budget.

items.title: Cleaning Service
items.text: We clean your apartment per day, week or fortnight, adapting to your needs.

items.title: Manage the expenses of the apartment
items.text: Electricity, gas, water, internet etc. We track the rent and bills payment, through payment receipts.

items.title: Maintenance Service
items.text: Repair of any type of breakdown (painting, plumbing, electricity etc.)

items.title: Comprehensive Refurbishment
items.text: Construction, remodeling, renovation and small repairs

text.p1: Our photographer specialized in interior photography and architecture, will make your apartment stand out from the rest with high-quality professional images.

bath.title: Bed linen/towels
bath.subtitle: If you need bed linens and towels for your tourist apartment, Rentaleazy provides you with everything you need. To meet your needs and offer your guests maximum comfort.
cost: Our bed linen and towels are used in 5 star hotels

maintenance.title: Maintenance and fine-tuning
maintenance.subtitle: We offer you a complete maintenance service, ranging from the review and repair of any type of breakdown, to the complete or partial refurbishment of the property.

clean.title: Cleaning Service
clean.subtitle: We provide provide professional cleaning and laundry service, taking care of every detail, to have your apartment in optimal conditions and make guests feeling at home.
items: Deep cleaning of kitchen and appliances*
cost: Apartments with more than 1 bedroom: +7,50€ per bedroom
clean.text: All cleaning products will be provided by the owner. Required in the house: vacuum cleaner, broom, dustpan, mop and bucket
